snippet.title: Glasshouse - Official Trailer | Dames 4 Games Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description: Get a deep dive into Glasshouse in this trailer for the upcoming feudalpunk turn-based-CRPG set in a lockdown apartment block at the dawn of a world war. Investigate the mysterious triple murder next door, fight the Political Conspiracy, and make terrible choices before the flatmates do it for you. Glasshouse will be available on PC.
